cppcoreguidelines-c-copy-assignment-sign.description:
Description

The
cppcoreguidelines-c-copy-assignment-signature
check is an alias,
please see
misc-unconventional-assign-operator
for more information.
cppcoreguidelines-c-copy-assignment-sign.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
